text: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo is a 1944 American World War II drama movie directed by Mervyn LeRoy and was based on the 1943 novel of the same name by Ted W. Lawson. It stars Spencer Tracy, Van Johnson, Robert Mitchum, Stephen McNally, Phyllis Thaxter, Robert Walker, Leon Amos, Benson Fong and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It was nominated for 2 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1945. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1944 drama movies Category:1944 war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Mervyn LeRoy
title: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
